headline: TTD to Rollout Audience Unlimited: Monetization Tailwind Ahead?
summary: The Trade Desk introduces Audience Unlimited and AI-powered trading modes to cut costs and boost ad campaign efficiency.

headline: The Trade Desk: Moving From Sell To Hold Amid Yellow Flags (Rating Upgrade)
summary: The Trade Desk, Inc., is upgraded after a 28% stock drop, making the valuation more reasonable but not yet a bargain. Read why TTD stock is a Hold.

headline: Is Trade Desk's (TTD) AI Data Move a Turning Point for Its Competitive Edge?
summary: The Trade Desk recently announced plans to launch Audience Unlimited, an AI-driven platform aimed at overhauling its digital advertising data marketplace to make third-party data more accessible and affordable for advertisers. This major upgrade leverages artificial intelligence for data curation and introduces new options for campaign flexibility, signaling a potential shift in how digital advertising budgets are allocated and optimized. We'll explore how Audience Unlimited's AI-powered...

headline: Q2 Earnings Outperformers: The Trade Desk (NASDAQ:TTD) And The Rest Of The Advertising Software Stocks
